There are tests which leave ZooKeeper clients behind. And the client SendThread loads `Configuration`. Hopefully this PR will fix the issue without having to track down every thread leak.

@guozhangwang I did update the first comment -- if you want a different commit message just let me know. Not sure about the title though -- it matches the JIRA title: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/KAFKA-5167
Test failures are not related to this patch.
Merging to trunk.
Review by @junrao

Refer to this link for build results (access rights to CI server needed): 
https://builds.apache.org/job/kafka-pr-jdk7-scala2.11/3858/
Test FAILed (JDK 7 and Scala 2.11).

Failure is unrelated:

```text
java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.AssertionError: Response not throttled: Client JOIN_GROUP apiKey JOIN_GROUP requests 3 requestTime 0.01080256922923123 throttleTime 0.0
```

@rajinisivaram, I saw this same failure on another PR an hour ago. Seems like the request throttling test is still flaky.

@mjsax seems a previous commit is breaking the build, I will look into and file a hotfix.

About the title: usually I'd like the commit message to be actually describing "Fix XXX" than "XXX", and I do not think it has to be the same as the JIRA title, which usually describe the issue "XXX" itself.
